Summary: Fast Mover-like a satelite-Very brite white/pale green-on-off-------------on/off
trends: There has been one other sighting in Valentine
There were no other sightings in Valentine on or around July 28th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsnebr. star party- merritt resivoir- snake campgrounds-27 miles south of valentine ne. partly cloudy surrounding our location-clear overhead naked eye observance dim object high up first noted moving from south\south west moving north\north west in a gentle arc- object started out dim like a satellite-then brightened very brite\white for short duration-dimming down to pale green-then to dim yellow then as if someone would turn on a light,brightened up 1\2 as bright at first,then as if turned off,back to original pale yellow,it moved over cloud bank- and disappeared from view. please note:i have attended numerous omaha mufon meetings and was handed over to field investigator gary matteson-if you want to continue this report, i would continue correspondence with him-jerry vencalek
